fieldset

submit form

HTML Structure
<!-- submit-form -->
<fieldset class="submit-form">
	<legend>fieldset name</legend>
	<div class="form-list">
		<div class="form-item">
			<div class="form-wrap">
				<div class="form-head"><label class="form-name" for="form_id">form name</label></div>
				<div class="form-body">
					<div class="form-area">

					</div>
				</div>
			</div>
		</div>
	</div>
</fieldset>
<!-- //submit-form -->
